snippet.title: // Down To Earth // UE4 EpicMegaJam Trailer
snippet.description:
Hey Lovelies! I just got done participating in the Unreal Engine 4 EpicMegaJam and this is an example of what playing my new game demo "Down To Earth" is like.. if you want to see it expanded and turned into a full game definitely leave a comment below! 
Find the game here:: https://luxireally.itch.io/down-to-earth

This was created for Windows 10, you might need to make sure DirectX is installed as well if a warning pops up. 

I made all the pixel art and models myself using Blender and Piskel, the soundtrack is also available on my bandcamp page here:: https://luximusic.bandcamp.com/album/down-to-earth-ep .. if you download the game the soundtrack that I also created within the game jam week using Ableton Live is included in a folder named "MUSIC" so definitely check that out.  

This was one of the most fun times I've had making a quick little jam game! Some of the textures are from the startup content that I modified and also a couple sound effects are from a royalty free website called soundbible. 

If you want to see my other work check out http://www.luxireally.com or http://www.wickedalley.com

Thanks so much for playing / watching! xoxo
